author: iSazonov
body:
Sample to remove all `x64` subdirectories:
```powershell
    Get-ChildItem -Path ./  -Directory -Include "*x64*" -Recurse | Remove-Item -Force
```

From @mklement0:
   We want that it to work against the full path. For the leaf component it is already work.
